name: Airtable Capabilities
description: Evaluation dataset for Airtable subagent capabilities including base management, table operations, record CRUD, and field management. Includes lazy queries, intentional mistakes, and ambiguous items.

items.input: list all my bases
items.expected_output: List all Airtable bases accessible to user.

items.input: show tables in Projects base
items.expected_output: 1. List bases. 2. Find Projects base. 3. Get base schema to see tables.

items.input: create record in Tasks table with name 'Review PR' and status 'Todo'
items.expected_output: 1. Find base with Tasks table. 2. Create record with specified fields.

items.input: get all records from Clients table
items.expected_output: 1. Find base with Clients table. 2. List records from table.

items.input: update record where Name is 'John' to set Status as 'Complete'
items.expected_output: 1. Find table. 2. List records with filter for Name=John. 3.  Update record status.
items.context: User wants to update specific record

items.input: delete the record about canceled project
items.expected_output: 1. Search records for 'canceled project'. 2. Request confirmation. 3. Delete record.
items.context: User wants to delete - needs consent

items.input: create table called 'Inventory' in main base
items.expected_output: 1. Find main base. 2. Create table named 'Inventory' with default fields.

items.input: add column 'Due Date' to Tasks table
items.expected_output: 1. Find base with Tasks. 2. Create field named 'Due Date' with date type.

items.input: get schema for CRM base
items.expected_output: 1. Find CRM base. 2. Get base schema with tables and fields.

items.input: filter records where Status is 'In Progress'
items.expected_output: List records with filterByFormula for Status='In Progress'.

items.input: add comment to record about budget approval
items.expected_output: 1. Find record about budget. 2. Create comment on record.

items.input: create multiple records for new employees
items.expected_output: Create multiple records in batch with employee data.

items.input: get record with ID rec123abc
items.expected_output: Get specific record by record ID.

items.input: who am I in airtabble
items.expected_output: 1. Recognize 'airtabble' as typo for 'airtable'. 2. Get user info.

items.input: show comments on record about Q4 planning
items.expected_output: 1. Find record about Q4 planning. 2. List comments on record.

items.input: create new base called 'Project Tracker'
items.expected_output: Create new Airtable base with name 'Project Tracker'.

items.input: update multiple records to set Status to 'Archived'
items.expected_output: Update multiple records in batch to change status.

items.input: sort records by Created Date descending
items.expected_output: List records with sort parameter for Created Date in descending order.

items.input: delete comment from the task record
items.expected_output: 1. Find task record. 2. Find comment. 3. Request confirmation. 4. Delete comment.
items.context: User wants to delete comment - needs consent

items.input: get only Name and Email fields from Contacts
items.expected_output: List records from Contacts with fields parameter for Name and Email only.
